onyomiExamples.meaning: spirit, mind, heart, nature, disposition, motivation, intention, mood, feelings, ambience, atmosphere, mood
(fighting) spirit, motivation, effort, shout (for getting in the right mood to deal with something, etc.), cheer, yell, kiai, short shout when performing an attacking move
water content, moisture, juiciness, dampness, water vapor (vapour), steam, dropsy, edema, oedema
sign, indication, trace, touch, feeling, somehow, for some reason, seeming to be
indication, sign, hint, sensation, feeling, tone (of the market)
